Name: Angular Speedster Board 2000
Description: Fast, stable all-mountain board with a directional twin shape and medium flex. Built for carving and pop without feeling too stiff.

Name: Green Angular Board 3000
Description: Playful freestyle board with a soft-to-medium flex that is easy to press and spin. Great for park progression and mellow groomers.

Name: Core Board Speed Rush 3
Description: Responsive freeride board with a set-back stance and extra edge hold. Designed for stability at speed and chopped snow.

Name: Net Core Super Board
Description: Premium all-mountain deck with a damp core and carbon stringers. Smooth in variable snow and strong on big turns.

Name: React Board Super Whizzy Fast
Description: Lively camber board with quick turn initiation and solid edge grip. Balanced for resort riding, jumps, and side hits.

Name: Typescript Entry Board
Description: Beginner-friendly board with an easy flex and catch-free rocker zones. Perfect for learning turns and building confidence.

Name: Core Blue Hat
Description: Warm acrylic knit beanie with a soft fleece band for comfort. Stretches to fit snug without itching.

Name: Green React Woolen Hat
Description: Wool blend beanie that traps heat and stays breathable. Rib-knit texture keeps its shape after long days.

Name: Purple React Woolen Hat
Description: Cozy, lightweight beanie with a stretch fit and low-profile cuff. Ideal under a helmet or on its own.

Name: Blue Code Gloves
Description: Water-resistant snowboard gloves with a soft lining and grippy palm. Flexible enough for buckles and zipper pulls.

Name: Green Code Gloves
Description: Insulated gloves built for cold lift rides. Durable shell with reinforced fingertips for extra wear.

Name: Purple React Gloves
Description: All-mountain gloves with a warm microfleece lining and adjustable wrist strap. Great balance of warmth and dexterity.

Name: Green React Gloves
Description: Breathable gloves for mild to cold days with a snug cuff and touchscreen-ready index finger.

Name: Redis Red Boots
Description: All-mountain boots with a supportive flex and heat-moldable liner. Secure heel hold and cushioned outsole for long days.

Name: Core Red Boots
Description: Stiff-leaning boots for precise response and edge control. Dual-zone lacing and shock-absorbing footbed.

Name: Core Purple Boots
Description: Medium flex boots with a comfortable fit right out of the box. Lightweight outsole and quick-lace system.

Name: Angular Purple Boots
Description: Comfort-focused boots with a smooth flex and warm liner. Great for riders who want easy control and forgiveness.

Name: Angular Blue Boots
Description: Versatile boots with balanced flex and reliable support. Padded tongue and EVA sole for comfort and impact protection.
